instructions: Create a Postgres database and run db/schema.sql (or use Prisma migrate with prisma.schema)
Register at https://clerk.com (free) and create an application. Copy the frontend API (or publishable key) and server API key into the .env files.
Start backend: cd apps/backend && npm run dev
Start frontend: cd apps/frontend && npm run dev
Visit http://localhost:3000, register/sign-in via Clerk and check /dashboard
